generated_description: consultthings is a consultancy firm based in bergen, vestland, norway. the company specializes in satellite telecommunications, broadband services, and the internet of things (iot). consultthings offers a range of services including executive management, contract management, project management, innovation management, and business development. they focus on areas such as smart home automation, smartgrid technologies, and cloud-based services. the firm also provides detailed design capabilities for telecommunications and it systems, including lan/wan/vpn/voip/iptv design and operation. consultthings is experienced in software development, including hardware and software prototyping, and offers solutions in enterprise bus, crm, erp, and business intelligence.
